Game.Title: The Mysteries Of Little Riddle Trophies

Trophy.Title: EP1: The Math Master
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded when the player earns a gold medal in the most math-intensive puzzle of the episode during the Story Mode

Trophy.Title: EP1: The Logic Master
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded when the player earns a gold medal in the most logic-intensive puzzle of the episode during the Story Mode

Trophy.Title: EP1: The Fastest Answer
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded the first time a player solves a puzzle in half of the gold award time during the Story Mode

Trophy.Title: EP1: Case Reviewed
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded after the player correctly answers all the Case Review questions

Trophy.Title: EP1: Sherlock Is Alive
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded after the player earns a gold medal in all the puzzles during the Story Mode

Trophy.Title: EP1: Mystery Solved
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded after the player correctly identifies the culprit

Trophy.Title: EP1: Made it to the end
Trophy.Description: This trophy is awarded when the player finishes Episode One
